PIVMat Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
getsetname
Get the name of the current set (directory)

Description 
S = getsetname returns the name of the current directory. While PWD 
returns the full path 'dir1/dir2/../dirn', getsetname returns only the 
last element 'dirn'. 
S = getsetname(DIR) returns the name of the last directory of the path 
DIR. 
 
For DaVis files, the SET name corresponds to the name of the folder 
where the VC7 or IM7 files are stored.
See Also 
PWD, loadvec, getvar. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo getsetname
